name: Mass Spring Particle Systems
details: For my final year project I created a system which demonstrates mass spring particle systems. I researched, designed and developed this system over the course of my final year. I chose to develop the system using C++ and OpenGL in Visual Studio 2010. I decided to demonstrate cloth and added natural forces such as gravity and wind. A simple collision detection function was also included. Information about all three stages in this project can be found in the documentation. The video below shows a demonstration of the final application
